li.p: Click the device in the device list.
From the left panel, select the Device template under Monitoring Templates.
Select Add Local Template from the Action menu.
Enter an identifier for the template (such as ZenMailTx), and then click Submit to create the template.
Click the newly created ZenMailTx template.
In the Data Sources area, click Add to add a data source.
Enter a name for the data source (MailTx), select MAILTX as the type, and then click Submit.

note.p: Any of the MAILTX fields can take TAL expressions, including the password fields.

li.p: Click Save to save your changes.
Navigate to Graphs and you should see some place holders for graphs. After approximately fifteen minutes you should see the graphs begin populating with information.
